name: Elridge Gammad
text: Agree with  Liza  of they are so hell-bent on killing alleged criminals and short cutting due process I propose a Constitutional amendment that guarantees due process and equal protection to Filipinos who choose to and as proxy for choice all who voted for him will lose their equal protection and due process guarantees. We can always say to them "If you aren't a criminal or doing anything wrong you shouldn't be afraid"
